section.name: Stable builds
section.p: We have just started to create stable builds: these are builds of the most recent tested code provided for your convenience. They have been declared best-so-far but they are not official releases of the Apache Harmony project or the Apache Software Foundation. Here you can find schedule and requirements for M2 milestone.

section.name: M2 Schedule
section.p: We are planning to deliver stable builds each two months. Below is the schedule for the M2 stable build

ul.li: 23-Jun-2007: M2 code freeze. Only critical bug fixes go in.
13-Jun-2007: M2 feature freeze. No major redesigns since that date.

section.name: M2 Requirements
section.p: Each stable build is intended to have best achived stability, perfomance, compatibility, and completeness. The requirements below set specific focus for M2.

ul.li: Harmony class library and VM tests pass, no new tests are excluded
Harmony works smoothly with Eclipse 3.2 (no known bugs)
All Dacapo benches correctly with all workloads, new features or patches that will be commit prior M2 do not introduce degradations
Scimark benchmark works correctly, new features or patches that will be commit prior M2 do not introduce degradations
